get_concept(ontology_version_id,concept_id,options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 100
100:     def get_concept ontology_version_id,concept_id,options={}
101:       
102:       options[:light]=(options[:light] && options[:light]!=0) ? 1 : 0
103:       
104:       concept_url="/concepts/%ID%?conceptid=%CONCEPT_ID%&"
105:       concept_url=concept_url.gsub("%ID%",ontology_version_id.to_s)
106:       concept_url=concept_url.gsub("%CONCEPT_ID%",URI.encode(concept_id))
107:       options.keys.each{|key| concept_url += "#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
108:       concept_url=concept_url[0..-2]
109:       
110:       full_concept_path=bioportal_base_rest_url+concept_url
111:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(full_concept_path))
112:       doc = parser.parse
113:       
114:       results = error_check doc
115: 
116:       unless results.nil?
117:         return results
118:       end
119: 
120:       return process_concepts_xml(doc).merge({:ontology_version_id=>ontology_version_id})
121:     end
get_concepts_for_ontology_version_id(ontology_version_id,options={})

options can include 

 - offset - the offet to start from
 - limit - the maximum number of terms returns

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 201
201:     def get_concepts_for_ontology_version_id ontology_version_id,options={}
202:       options[:offset]||=0
203:       uri="/concepts/#{ontology_version_id}/all?"
204:       options.keys.each{|k|uri+="#{k}=#{URI.encode(options[k].to_s)}&"}
205:       uri=uri[0..-2]
206:       uri=bioportal_base_rest_url + uri
207:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(uri))
208:       doc = parser.parse
209: 
210:       concepts = error_check doc
211:       unless concepts.nil?
212:         return concepts
213:       end
214: 
215:       concepts=[]
216:       doc.find("/*/data/list/classBean").each{ |element|
217:         concepts << process_concept_bean_xml(element)
218:       }
219:       return concepts
220:       
221:     end

options can include 

 - offset - the offet to start from
 - limit - the maximum number of terms returns

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 226
226:     def get_concepts_for_virtual_ontology_id virtual_ontology_id,options={}
227:       uri="/virtual/ontology/#{virtual_ontology_id}/all?"
228:       options.keys.each{|k|uri+="#{k}=#{URI.encode(options[k])}&"}
229:       uri=uri[0..-2]
230:       uri=bioportal_base_rest_url + uri
231:       
232:       doc = REXML::Document.new(open(uri))
233: 
234:       concepts = error_check doc
235:       unless concepts.nil?
236:         return concepts
237:       end
238: 
239:       concepts=[]
240:       #TODO: parse concept list (xml is different to single concept)
241:       return concepts
242: 
243:     end
get_ontology_details(ontology_version_id,options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 123
123:     def get_ontology_details ontology_version_id,options={}
124:       ontologies_url="/ontologies/#{ontology_version_id}?"
125: 
126:       options.keys.each{|key| ontologies_url += "#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
127:       ontologies_url=ontologies_url[0..-2]
128:       url=bioportal_base_rest_url+ontologies_url
129:       
130:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(url))
131:       doc = parser.parse
132:       
133:       results = error_check doc
134: 
135:       unless results.nil?
136:         return results
137:       end
138: 
139:       doc.find("/*/data/ontologyBean").each{ |element|
140:         return parse_ontology_bean_xml(element)
141:       }
142:       
143:     end
get_ontology_versions(options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 178
178:     def get_ontology_versions options={}
179:       ontologies_url="/ontologies?"
180: 
181:       options.keys.each{|key| ontologies_url += "#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
182:       ontologies_url=ontologies_url[0..-2] #chop of trailing &
183:       uri=bioportal_base_rest_url+ontologies_url
184:       
185:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(uri))
186:       doc = parser.parse
187: 
188:       ontologies = error_check doc
189: 
190:       unless ontologies.nil?
191:         return ontologies
192:       end
193: 
194:       return parse_ontologies_xml doc
195:     end
search(query,options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 145
145:     def search query,options={}
146:       options[:pagesize] ||= 10
147:       options[:pagenum] ||= 0
148:       
149:       search_url="/search/%QUERY%?"
150:       options.keys.each {|key| search_url+="#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
151:       search_url=search_url[0..-2] #chop of trailing &
152:       
153:       search_url=search_url.gsub("%QUERY%",URI.encode(query))
154:       full_search_path=bioportal_base_rest_url+search_url
155:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(full_search_path))
156:       doc = parser.parse
157: 
158:       results = error_check doc
159: 
160:       unless results.nil?
161:         return results
162:       end
163: 
164:       results = []
165:       doc.find("/*/data/page/contents/searchResultList/searchBean").each{ |element|
166:         results << parse_search_result(element)
167:       }
168: 
169:       pages = 1
170:       doc.find("/*/data/page").each{|element|
171:         pages = element.first.find(element.path + "/numPages").first.content
172:       }
173: 
174:       return results.uniq,pages
175: 
176:     end

[Validate]
